18#include "includes.h"
19__RCSID("$NetBSD: freezero.c,v 1.1 2018/04/06 18:59:00 christos Exp $");
20
21#include <string.h>
22#include <stdlib.h>
23
24#ifndef HAVE_FREEZERO
25
26void
27freezero(void *ptr, size_t sz)
28{
29 if (ptr == NULL)
30 return;
31 explicit_bzero(ptr, sz);
32 free(ptr);
33}
34
35#endif /* HAVE_FREEZERO */
36
37
